title: Ethical Technology: Escaping the Algorithm
blurb:
Stepping away from algorithm-driven platforms gave me a clearer view of how technology shapes our choices in favor of profit. This reflection explores the ethical tradeoffs behind design decisions—and what it means to build mentally healthier digital spaces.

title: Helping Mission-Driven Teams Work Smarter
blurb:
During my time in the military, I saw firsthand how many mission-driven organizations struggle with outdated systems and a lack of technical expertise. This reflection explores the potential of a tech-forward mindset in mission-driven environments.

title: Humanities in Tech: A Valuable Resource
blurb:
Technical skills drive innovation—but human insight gives it direction. This post reflects on how my humanities background shaped my approach to problem-solving, communication, and ethical decision-making in tech-forward environments.

title: How I’m Using ChatGPT for My Career Pivot
blurb:
Transitioning from the military to a civilian career can be overwhelming but tools like ChatGPT have helped me structure that pivot. This post explores how I’ve used it to brainstorm next steps, explore new fields, and figure out next steps. This post outlines the ways I’m using AI to bring more clarity and intention to my career transition—and how others might do the same.
